headline.main: Adriatic Union Opposed; As Conceived by Italy It Is Held Doubtful of Accomplishment

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Referring to the recent Sforza-Simovic controversy regarding Trieste, and the several letters to THE NEW YORK TIMES which followed, a few words from a Croat might help to elucidate certain debatable points.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
